name: Dajiumajia (Aunt's House 大舅妈家.公寓鬼打墙) Updated 2021.9.12
name_original: Dajiumajia (Aunt's House 大舅妈家.公寓鬼打墙) Updated 2021.9.12
description:
Your aunt bought a new building but it's haunted,a fire years ago killed people here.You want to cast out the ghosts for her but you are too young in Taoism yet.The ghosts trapped you in the memory maze,and you need to collect the rabbits the good gods offer for you,which could help you break the current condition and be free.

在 大舅妈家.公寓鬼打墙 里，你是一位涉世未深的新人道士。大舅妈刚刚买下了一栋所谓闹鬼的公寓，你正有意向为其免费驱鬼作法。可惜功力不够反被厉鬼鬼打墙，只有收集土地公留下的金兔子才能打开结界暂先重获自由......

More monsters,bigger map,updated!
